All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminEventsViewModel
ViewModel used by AdminSelectEventFragment to load a list of ALL events.
AdminImageItem
A simple data model representing an image associated with an event for administrative purposes.
AdminImagesAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a grid or list of images in the Admin Dashboard.
AdminImagesAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an image is clicked.
AdminImagesFragment
Fragment allowing administrators to browse all uploaded images.
AdminImagesRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the IAdminImagesRepository interface.
AdminImagesViewModel
ViewModel for the Admin Images Dashboard.
AdminProfilesAdapter
This adapter binds user objects to UI elements in item_entrant.xml Each list item shows the user's name and has a click listener for profile selection
AdminProfilesAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a profile is clicked.
AdminProfilesFragment
A Fragment that handles the administration of user profiles.
AdminProfilesRepositoryImpl
This class implemetns IAdminProfilesRepository This class for the retrieval of all profiles in the db for the admin to view
AdminProfilesViewModel
ViewModel responsible for managing and exposing user profile data to UI for admin features.
AdminSelectEventFragment
This fragment displays a list of all events for the admin to choose from when viewing notifications sent by organizers Displays recyclerView of all events and navigates to NotificationFragment when event is selected
AdminSentNotificationsFragment
Fragment to redirect admin to event-selection screen where they can choose an event and view relevant notifications
AdminUserProfileFragment
A Fragment that displays the administrative view of a specific user profile.
AdminUserProfileRepositoryImpl
Implementation of IAdminUserProfileRepository that retrieves user data directly from Firebase Firestore.
AvailableEventsFragment
A Fragment subclass that allows entrants to view a list of available events.
AvailableEventsRepositoryImpl
This class implements IAvailableEventsRepository.
AvailableEventsViewModel
ViewModel for the Available Events screen, responsible for preparing and managing the data for the UI.
BottomUiState
A helper class to represent possible states of the screen, depending on how fetching data performs.
BottomUiState.StateType
 
ConfirmDrawAndNotifyFragment
This fragment allows the organizer to view the number of entrants drawn, confirm draw, and notify the selected entrants.
ConfirmDrawAndNotifyViewModel
ViewModel for ConfirmDrawAndNotifyFragment This class handles the logic behind allowing the organizer to view the number of entrants drawn, confirm draw, and notify the selected entrants.
CreateEventFragment
A Fragment that provides a UI for creating a new event.
CreateEventViewModel
ViewModel for the CreateEventFragment.
Entrant
Represents a single entrant in an event's subcollection.
EntrantListAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Entrant objects.
EntrantListAdapter.OnEntrantActionListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is performed on an entrant item.
EntrantListAdapter.ViewHolder
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
EntrantListFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying a list of entrants for a specific event, filtered by their status.
EntrantListRepositoryImpl
This class is responsible for retrieving entrant information for events and sending organizer notifications to individual entrants.
EntrantListViewModel
ViewModel responsible for providing entrant data and notification functionality to the UI layer.
EntrantMapFragment
 
EntrantMapViewModel
 
Event
Represents a single event in the lottery system.
EventAdapter
A RecyclerView.Adapter that is responsible for displaying a list of Event objects in a grid format.
EventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
A listener interface for receiving callbacks when an item in the RecyclerView is clicked.
EventDetailsFragment
A Fragment that displays the details of a single event.
EventDetailsRepositoryImpl
Implements IEventDetailsRepository.
EventDetailsViewModel
ViewModel for the EventDetailsFragment.
EventDetailsViewModelFactory
Triggers the deletion process via the ViewModel using the current userId.
EventRepositoryImpl
Concrete implementation of the IEventRepository.
FakeAdminUserProfileRepository
A mock implementation of IAdminUserProfileRepository used for testing and UI development.
FireStoreUtilities
Utility class for handling Firestore operations related to lottery events.
GenericViewModelFactory
A reusable, generic ViewModelProvider.Factory.
HomeFragment
A Fragment that serves as the main home screen of the application.
HomeViewModel
ViewModel for the Home screen, responsible for preparing and managing the data for the UI.
IAdminImagesRepository
Interface defining the contract for the repository responsible for managing Admin Image data.
IAdminImagesRepository.DeleteCallback
Callback interface to handle the asynchronous results of a delete operation.
IAdminImagesRepository.ImagesCallback
Callback interface to handle the asynchronous results of fetching images.
IAdminProfilesRepository
Interface to allow the fetching of all user profiles from firestore and returning them through callback
IAdminProfilesRepository.ProfilesCallback
 
IAdminUserProfileRepository
Defines the contract for retrieving detailed user profile information from the data source (e.g., Firestore) for administrative purposes.
IAdminUserProfileRepository.UserProfileCallback
Callback interface to handle the asynchronous results of user profile retrieval.
IAvailableEventsRepository
 
IEntrantListRepository
This class defines the contract for repositories responsible for retrieving entrant data and sending notifications related to events.
IEntrantListRepository.StatusUpdateCallback
Simple callback interface for status updates.
IEventDetailsRepository
Interface for the repository that handles data for the Event Details screen.
IEventRepository
Interface for the Event Repository.
INotificationRepository
Interface for marking notifs as seen and detaching notif listener
INotificationRepository.UserNameCallback
A simple callback interface for handling asynchronous user name retrieval.
IOrganizerEventRepository
Interface for the fetching of event details and their entrants.
IRegistrationHistoryRepository
This class defines the contract for repositories responsible for retrieving a user's registration history.
IRunDrawRepository
Repo interface for Run Draw
IUserRepository
Inferace for updating, deleting profile and updating notif preferences
LotteryGuidelinesFragment
A Fragment subclass that allows users to view the lottery guidelines.
MainActivity
The main and only activity for the application, following a Single Activity Architecture.
Notification
Represents a single notification in the lottery system.
NotificationAdapter
A RecyclerView.Adapter that is responsible for displaying a list of Notification objects in a list format.
NotificationAdapter.OnItemClickListener
A listener interface for receiving callbacks when an item in the RecyclerView is clicked.
NotificationCustomManager
A class that provides management of notifications including sending notifications, by creating notification documents under a given user's notification collection in Firebase, setting up a notification channel, and generating notifications to be displayed to the user.
NotificationRepositoryImpl
Implements INotificationRepository Allows for marking notifs as seen and detaching notif listener
NotificationsFragment
A Fragment that displays a list of notifications for the user.
NotificationsViewModel
ViewModel for the NotificationsFragment.
OrganizerEventFragment
Displays info about a single event for the organizer to view.
OrganizerEventRepositoryImpl
Implements IOrganizerEventRepository Allows for the fetching of event details and their entrants.
OrganizerEventViewModel
ViewModel for the OrganizerEventFragment.
OrganizerEventViewModel.UiState
Enum representing the possible states of the UI.
QrScannerFragment
A fragment for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
QrScannerViewModel
 
RegistrationHistoryFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying the current user's registration history for lottery events.
RegistrationHistoryItem
This class creates an item that will represent each row in the registration history fragment.
RegistrationHistoryRepositoryImpl
This class reads through each of the events, check if the UID is inside the entrants subcollection, and then returns a list of event name + the user's status.
RegistrationHistoryViewModel
ViewModel responsible for exposing a user's registration history to the UI.
RunDrawFragment
This fragment allows the organizer to run the draw for an event.
RunDrawRepositoryImpl
Run Draw repository that handles all firestore operations for running draw and loading event metrics
RunDrawViewModel
Viewmodel for RunDrawFragment
User
Represents a single document in the user collection This POJO is a direct mapping of the '/user/{userId}' schema.
UserProfileFragment
A Fragment subclass that allows users to view and update their profile information.
UserProfileViewModel
ViewModel for the UserProfile screen, responsible for preparing and managing the data for the UI
UserRepositoryImpl
Implements IUserRepository.
